name: 'merica
description:
'merica is a game made for a 1st year game design school project made in a week (not full time) 

in the game you will have 110 seconds to collect Americans and put them in a pen and collect the bleach and throw it down the hole. If you manage to find trump and throw him down the hole you get some extra points. 

The Controls:

directional arrows for left right back and forward 

c = drop people into pen 

v = drop bleach 

b = drop trump 

Credits:

coding, development, game design and level design - Courtney Ferreira

assets = low poly free asset packs on unity store

trump asset = https://denysalmaral.com/2016/11/free-lowpoly-donald-trump-3d-character.html
